message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing an initial price of $1,600,000.  I believe this is a fair starting point for discussion.

I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not comfortable going above that price. I'm looking to save some money on this purchase.

Bob, I understand your desire to save on this purchase, and I value your interest. However, the product's worth significantly exceeds that figure. I'm willing to come down to $1,450,000. This represents a significant reduction on my part while still reflecting the true value of what's being offered.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $1,200,000 and $1,450,000, so I'm proposing a price of $1,325,000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the value of the product, and I'm willing to make a deal at this point.
